question: The total cost of 8 buckets and 5 mugs is 92 Rs. and the total cost of 5 buckets and 8 mugs is 77 Rs. Find the cost of 2 mugs and 3 buckets.
explanation:
C.P. of 1 bucket = x
C.P. of 1 mug = y
∴ 8x + 5y = 92 …..(1)
5x + 8y = 77 …..(2) 
By using equation (1) $latex \\times $ 5 - equation (2) $latex \\times $ 8, 
40x + 25y - 40x - 64y = 460 - 616
=> -39y = -156
=> y = 4
From equation (1), 
8x + 20 = 92
=> 8x = 92 - 20 = 72
=> x = 9
∴ C.P. of 2 mugs and 3 buckets
= 2 $latex \\times$ 4 + 3 $latex \\times$ 9
= 8 + 27 = 35 Rs.
Hence option [B] is correct answer.
